original_text: And looking about at those who sat around him, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers!
korean_text: 둘러 앉은 자들을 보시며 이르시되 내 어머니와 내 동생들을 보라

sentences.original_text: And looking about at those who sat around him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 주위에 앉은 사람들을 둘러보시며

sentences.original_text: “Here are my mother and my brothers!
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내 어머니와 내 형제들이 여기 있다!
